text: Hi team, please review the Q4 budget proposal. Contact me at john.doe@company.com or sarah.smith@company.com if you have questions.
URGENT: Server downtime scheduled for maintenance tonight at 11 PM. Reach ops team at ops@techcorp.com
Thank you for your order #12345. Your package will arrive in 3-5 business days. Questions? support@shop.com
Meeting invitation: Project kickoff tomorrow at 10 AM. RSVP to alice@startup.io and bob@startup.io
Your account password was changed. If this wasn't you, contact security@bank.com immediately.
Congratulations! You won our monthly raffle. Claim your prize by emailing winner@promo.net
Invoice #INV-2024-001 is overdue. Please remit payment to accounting@vendor.com
New feature release notes: We've added dark mode! Feedback welcome at feedback@product.io
Job application received. HR will contact you at the email provided within 2 weeks.
System alert: Disk usage at 95%. Please contact sysadmin@datacenter.net urgently.
